nodes.bodyText: I believe this needs to load readLib.sjs and partition-lib.xqy as well, since initializeRead.sjs depends on those.
I see - determineReadRowsEndpointParams is called before initializeRead is called. Sounds good.

afterCommit.message: DHFPROD-6274: Install Spark modules for reading if not present

nodes.bodyText:
Just realized this is duplicated from HubDataSourceWriter!
Let's instead have a ModuleWriter class with methods of loadModuleIfNotPresent and endpointExists. It should go in the "v2" package since it's generic to read/write. Its constructor should accept a HubClient which it'll use to interact with the modules database.
This can go into ModuleWriter as well.
